import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './header.scss' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {ReactComponent as Logo} from '../../assets/crown.svg' import {auth} from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import Cart from '../../components/cart/cart' import CardDrop from '../../components/cartDrop/cd' import {cartToggle} from '../../redux/cart/cart.action' const Header=({currentUser})=>{ return( <>
SHOP CONTACT {currentUser? (
{auth.signOut()}} >SIGN-OUT
) : (SIGN-IN) }
) } const mapStatesToProps=({user:{currentUser},cart:{hidden}})=>({ currentUser, hidden }) export default connect(mapStatesToProps)(Header)
